origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'CreditAnalytics.get_credit_data', 'description': 'Get credit rating data for a specific bank over the past five years.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the bank.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'credit_data', 'description': 'A dictionary containing credit rating data for the bank over the past five years.'}]}, {'name': 'CreditAnalytics.analyze_credit_factors', 'description': 'Analyze key factors influencing credit ratings using AI algorithms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'credit_data', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The credit rating data obtained from CreditAnalytics.get_credit_data.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the analysis results of key credit rating factors.'}]}, {'name': 'CreditAnalytics.predict_credit_trend', 'description': 'Predict the future credit rating trend for the next year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The analysis results obtained from CreditAnalytics.analyze_credit_factors.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'prediction_results', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the predicted credit rating trend for the next year.'}]}, {'name': 'CreditAnalytics.provide_credit_management_advice', 'description': 'Provide AI-based credit rating management advice.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'prediction_results', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The prediction results obtained from CreditAnalytics.predict_credit_trend.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'advice', 'description': 'A dictionary containing AI-based credit rating management advice.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要评估人工智能技术在信用评级管理中的应用。首先，获取Bank of America过去五年的信用评级数据。然后，使用人工智能算法分析信用评级的关键因素。接着，预测未来一年的信用评级趋势。最后，提供基于人工智能的信用评级管理建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取Bank of America过去五年的信用评级数据。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'bank_name'的值是什么?
